description:
After many decades of interest I finally had my first real flight lesson! In this video I look at how different real flying is vs. simulators. My new flight channel can be found at http://lon.tv/flying  subscribe to it now and I'll add more content soon ! 

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:23 - Content plans around flying 
02:31 - Interest from DOS flight simulators
03:33 - First Flight
04:39 - FlightAware Profile 
06:31 - Flight Simulator
07:27 - Flight Sim Controls I use
09:24 - VR Mode thoughts
10:20 - Conclusion

Visit my Blog! https://blog.lon.tv

title: I took my 1st flight lesson! How does real life compare to MS Flight Simulator?
